title: Ethiopian Airlines makes flying simple with rollout of fast travel self check-in
text:
(Photo: iStock) YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

Queues at the airport may be a thing of the past thanks to an innovation by the largest aviation group in Africa. Ethiopian Airlines just made it a whole lot easier to check-in thanks to its full implementation of the Self Check-in Initiative which enables customers to check-in using their mobile device.

The new Self Check-in Initiative provides hassle free check-in experience with self-service channels including mobile phone, web, kiosk and auto check-in without having to go to the airport. Moreover, passengers can get their boarding pass via Ethiopian Mobile Application or Ethiopian Website.

WATCH: SAA vs Ethiopian Airlines, which is the better airline?

The Auto Check-in also enables domestic passengers to get their boarding pass by email 3 hours before departure if they give their email address at time of booking.

Group CEO of Ethiopian Airlines, Mr. Tewolde GebreMariam, remarked: “As a customer focused airline, we are very delighted that our main hub, Addis Ababa Airport, is among pioneering airports that is fully implementing IATA’s Fast Travel Self Check-in initiative.

The implementation of digital-driven self-services is vital for today’s air travel and self-check-in enables our customers to be fully in control of their check-in process and avoid standing in line at the airport. In line with Vision 2025, we are continuously investing in technology solutions and simplified processes in order to avail the best possible travel experience.”

Passengers seeking a more seamless travel experience with expanded convenience can look forward to easy travels all 2019.
